database.description: True means healthy, connected to database

inSync.description: True means healthy. False means Midgard is still catching up to the chain

count.description: Int64, count of txs matching the filters.

totalStandbyBond.description: Int64, Total bond of standby nodes

assetDepth.description: Int64, the amount of Asset in the pool.

assetPrice.description: Float, price of asset in rune. I.e. rune amount / asset amount.

endTime.description: Int64, The end time of bucket in unix timestamp

runeDepth.description: Int64, the amount of Rune in the pool.

startTime.description: Int64, The beginning time of bucket in unix timestamp

endTime.description: Int64, The end time of bucket in unix timestamp

startTime.description: Int64, The beginning time of bucket in unix timestamp

avgNodeCount.description: float64, Average amount of active nodes during the time interval

blockRewards.description: Int64, Total block rewards emitted during the time interval

bondingEarnings.description: Int64, Share of earnings sent to nodes during the time interval

earnings.description: Int64, System income generated during the time interval. It is the sum of liquidity fees and block rewards.

endTime.description: Int64, The end time of interval in unix timestamp

liquidityEarnings.description: Int64, Share of earnings sent to pools during the time interval

liquidityFees.description: Int64, Total liquidity fees, converted to RUNE, collected during the time interval.

pools.description: Earnings data for each pool for the time interval

startTime.description: Int64, The beginning time of interval in unix timestamp

EarningsHistoryItemPool.description: pool earnings data during the time interval

earnings.description: Int64, Share of earnings sent to the pool during the time interval

halted.description: indicate whether this chain has halted

deposits.description: Int64, total deposits (liquidity additions) during the time interval

endTime.description: Int64, The end time of bucket in unix timestamp

net.description: Int64, net liquidity changes (withdrawals - deposits) during the time interval

startTime.description: Int64, The beginning time of bucket in unix timestamp

withdrawals.description: Int64, total withdrawals during the time interval

pools.description: Liquidity provider data for all the pools of a given member

assetAdded.description: Int64, total asset added to the pool by member

assetWithdrawn.description: Int64, total asset withdrawn from the pool by member

dateFirstAdded.description: Int64, Unix timestamp for the first time member deposited into the pool

dateLastAdded.description: Int64, Unix timestamp for the last time member deposited into the pool

liquidityUnits.description: Int64, pool liquidity units that belong the the member

pool.description: Pool rest of the data refers to

runeAdded.description: Int64, total RUNE added to the pool by member

runeWithdrawn.description: Int64, total RUNE withdrawn from the pool by member

poolActivationCountdown.description: Int64, the remaining time of pool activation (in blocks).

totalPooledRune.description: Int64, Total Rune pooled in all pools.

assetDepth.description: Int64, the amount of Asset in the pool.

assetPrice.description: Float, price of asset in rune. I.e. rune amount / asset amount.

poolAPY.description: Float, Average Percentage Yield: annual return estimated using last weeks income, taking compound interest into account.

runeDepth.description: Int64, the amount of Rune in the pool.

status.description: The state of the pool, e.g. Available, Staged.

units.description: Int64, Liquidity Units in the pool.

volume24h.description: Int64, the total volume of swaps in the last 24h to and from Rune denoted in Rune.

totalVolume.description: Total (in RUNE Value) of all assets swapped since start.

averageSlip.description: Int64, the average slip by swap. Big swaps have the same weight as small swaps

endTime.description: Int64, The end time of bucket in unix timestamp

startTime.description: Int64, The beginning time of bucket in unix timestamp

toAssetCount.description: Int64, count of swaps from rune to asset

toAssetVolume.description: Int64, volume of swaps from rune to asset denoted in rune

toRuneCount.description: Int64, count of swaps from asset to rune

toRuneVolume.description: Int64, volume of swaps from asset to rune denoted in rune

totalFees.description: Int64, the sum of all fees collected denoted in rune

info.description: The Midgard Public API queries THORChain and any chains linked via the Bifr√∂st and prepares information about the network to be readily available for public users. The API parses transaction event data from THORChain and stores them in a time-series database to make time-dependent queries easy. Midgard does not hold critical information. To interact with BEPSwap and Asgardex, users should query THORChain directly.
info.title: Midgard Public API

get.description: Returns an object containing the health response of the API

Returns the asset and rune depths and price.
The values report the state at the end of each interval.

Bucketing parameters:
* Interval is required, possible values: 5min, hour, day, week, month, quarter, year.
* count: optional int, (1..100)
* from/to: optional int, unix second.

Providing all count/from/to will result in error. Possible configurations:
* last 10 days: interval=day&count=10
* last 10 days before to: interval=day&count=10&to=1234567890
* interval=day&count=10&from=1234567890    - next 10 days after from.
* interval=day&from=1100000&to=1100000     - days between from and to. It will fail if more than 100 intervals are requested.
